Eset Smart Security 4 has detected NSIS/TrojanDownloader.Agent.NBX trojan virus. It could be a false positive but I have suffered quite a few times after excluding such false positive virus and in the end, I had to reinstall the operating system. If anyone has successfully installed this application, kindly leave a comment. I would be more than happy to allow the false positive virus. Check out the screenshot
